title: Snooze @ Wear Pro
summary: Easily snooze and dismiss alarms ringing on you phone from you wear device
description: === PLEASE TRY THE FREE VERSIONER BEFORY YOU BUY THE PRO VERSION TO ENSURE THAT IT WORKS WITH YOUR MOBILE/WATCH COMBINATION ===https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=se.agilesolutions.android.alarmwear.liteDo you wish you could snooze or dismiss alarms ringing on you phone from you Wear device? Now you can!This app acts as a remote interface for managing the alarms on your wear device. Alarms set up on the phone or tablet will be displayed on your wear device from which you easily can see the alarm to decide whether to dismiss or snooze it.If for some reason it doesn't work, please do not hesitate to contact us so we can incorporate support for your solution.
descriptionHTML:
=== PLEASE TRY THE FREE VERSIONER BEFORY YOU BUY THE PRO VERSION TO ENSURE THAT IT WORKS WITH YOUR MOBILE/WATCH COMBINATION ===
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=se.agilesolutions.android.alarmwear.lite


Do you wish you could snooze or dismiss alarms ringing on you phone from you Wear device? Now you can!

This app acts as a remote interface for managing the alarms on your wear device. Alarms set up on the phone or tablet will be displayed on your wear device from which you easily can see the alarm to decide whether to dismiss or snooze it.

If for some reason it doesn't work, please do not hesitate to contact us so we can incorporate support for your solution.
comments: Great Great little app, does exactly as advertised and the dev was great in finding a solution to the problem I was having
